title: Simple corn chowder
ingredients: ['drizzle of olive oil', '1 large white or red onion, chopped smallish', '2 large white potatoes, peeled and diced', '2 large tins sweetcorn (or similar quantity fresh in season)', '600ml (1 pint) vegetable stock', 'milk to your taste', 'salt and pepper', '1 teaspoon of cream, soured cream or yoghurt to each bowlful (optional)']
